ticket.tag: activerecord find find_all find_first find_last patch
ticket.title: More convenience wrappers for ActiveRecord::Base finds
ticket.original-body: I'm constantly annoyed when I type find_all and find_first and get a MethodNotFound error - these methods seem natural to me and to other developers I've talked to. So I thought I'd submit my first patch! These three methods are implemented and tested, and doc comments have been added. It's a simple implementation, but it works well.

version.body: I doubt you'll have much luck with this - the methods *used* to be named like that, back in 2005 or so.
